verses.text: PEA fuoloa atu, lolotonga ‘a e ututa‘u uite, na‘e ‘a‘ahi ‘a Samisoni ki hono uaifi ‘aki ha ki‘i kosi; ‘o ne pehē, Ka u ‘alu atu mu‘a ki hoku uaifi ki he loki. Ka ka ‘ikai tuku ‘e he tamai ‘a e fefine ke ne ‘alu kiate ia.
He na‘e pehē ‘e he motu‘a; Na‘a ku mātu‘aki lau kuo ke fehi‘a kiate ia, pea u ‘ange ki ho takaua: vakai, ‘ikai ‘oku faka‘ofo‘ofa ange hono tehina ‘iate ia? ke ke ma‘u mu‘a ia moono fetongi.
Pea pehē ‘e Samisoni kiate kinautolu, Te u toki tonuhekina eni mei he kau Filisitia, ‘oka u ka fai ha kovi kiate kinautolu.

Pea ‘alu ‘a Samisoni, ‘o ne pō ha fanga fōkisi ‘e toko tolungeau; ‘o ne to‘o mo e ngaahi tūhulu, ‘o ne fetu‘utaki ‘a e iku mo e iku, ‘o ne ‘ai ha tūhulu ‘e taha ki he vaha‘a ‘o ha ongo iku, ‘o pehē pē.

Pea ne tutu ‘a e ngaahi tūhulu, ‘o ne toki tukuange kinautolu ki he toutu‘u uite ‘a e kau Filisitia, pea na‘e vela ai ‘a e ngaahi fokotu‘unga uite, pea mo e me‘a na‘e kei tu‘u, ‘o fai atu ki he ngoue ‘ōlive.

Pea felau‘aki ‘a e kau Filisitia, ‘o pehē, Ko hai kuo ne fai eni? Pea nau tali, Ko Samisoni, ko e foha mali ‘o e motu‘a Timinate, koe‘uhi na‘a ne to‘o hono uaifi, ‘o ‘ange ki hono takaua. Pea ō hake ai ‘a e kau Filisitia, ‘o nau fakamomofi ‘a e fefine mo ‘ene tamai ‘aki ‘a e maama.
Pea pehē ‘e Samisoni kiate kinautolu, Neongo ho‘omou fai pehē, ka te u fai ha sauni kiate kimoutolu, pea hili ia pea u tuku.
Pea ne tā fesifesi kinautolu, ko e tāmate lahi: ‘o ne toki ‘alu hifo, ‘o nofo ‘i he ava ‘i he makatu‘u ko ‘Eitami.
Pea ‘alu hake ‘a e kau Filisitia, ‘o fokotu‘u tēniti ‘i Siuta, ‘o nau fakatē ‘enau tau ‘i Lehi.
Pea fakalea ange ‘a e kau tangata Siuta, Ko e hā kuo mou omi ai kiate kimautolu? Pea na‘a nau tali, Ko ‘emau omi ke ha‘i ‘a Samisoni, ke fai kiate ia ‘o hangē ko ‘ene fai kiate kimautolu.

Pea na‘e toki ‘alu hifo ha toko tolu afe ‘o ha‘a Siuta ki he ava ‘o e makatu‘u ko ‘Eitami, pea na‘a nau fakalea ange kia Samisoni, ‘o pehē, ‘Ikai ‘oku ke ‘ilo ‘oku pule ‘a ha‘a Filisitia kiate kitautolu? Pea ko e hā eni kuo ke fai kiate kimautolu. Pea ne tali ki ai, Hangē ko ‘enau fai kiate au, na‘e pehē ‘eku fai kiate kinautolu.
Pea na‘a nau pehē kiate ia, Ko ‘emau hifo eni ke ha‘i koe, ‘o tuku ki he nima ‘o e kau Filisitia. Pea pehē ‘e Samisoni kiate kinautolu, Fuakava mai ‘e ‘ikai te mou ala kiate au ‘e kimoutolu.

Pea na‘a nau tali ki ai ‘o pehē, ‘Ikai; ka te mau ha‘i koe ke ma‘u, ‘o tukuange ki honau nima: ka ‘e ‘ikai te mau kākunga ke tāmate‘i koe. Pea na‘a nau ha‘i ia ‘aki ha ongo maea fo‘ou, ‘o nau ‘ohake ia mei he makatu‘u.

Ha‘u ai ia ki Lehi, pea tuē ‘a e kau Filisitia ‘i he‘enau fakafetaulaki ki ai: ka ka ‘ohofia ia ‘e he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Eiki, pea ko e ongo maea na‘e ‘i hono nima na‘e hoko leva ‘o hangē ha vavae kuo mōfia ‘i he maama, pea na‘e mokulu ‘a e ha‘i mei hono nima.
Pea na‘a ne ‘ilo ‘a e hui kou‘ahe fo‘ou ‘o ha ‘asi, ‘o ne ala ‘o to‘o, ‘o ne te‘ia ‘aki ha afe‘i tangata.
Pea lea hake ‘a Samisoni, Ko ha hui kou‘ahe pē ‘o ha ‘asi, Kae hono taha ‘a e esi! Ko e hui kou‘ahe pē ‘o ha ‘asi, Kuo u tāmate‘i ‘aki ha afe‘i kakai.
Pea hili ‘ene lea ko ia, na‘a ne li‘aki ‘a e hui kou‘ahe; pea na‘e ui ‘a e potu ko ia ko Lama-Lehi (ko Lī‘anga-hui-kou‘ahe).

Pea ne mate he fie inu, ‘o ne tautapa ki he ‘Eiki, ‘o ne pehē, Ko eni kuo ke fakafai ‘i ho‘o tamaio‘eiki ‘a e fu‘u fakahaofi ko eni, ka u mate ai au he fie inu, ‘o tō ki he nima ‘o e fa‘ahinga ta‘ekamu na.

Ka ka foa‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ‘a e luo na‘e ‘i Lehi, pea na‘e ha‘u mei ai ‘a e vai; pea ne inu, pea toe ake hono laumālie, ‘o ne mo‘ui: ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e ui ai hono hingoa ko Eni-Hākole (ko e Vaikeli ‘o e Tautapa), ‘a ia ‘oku tu‘u ‘i Lehi ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho ni.
Pea ne fai fakamaau ‘i ‘Isileli ‘o uofulu ta‘u, ‘i he kuonga ‘o e kau Filisitia.
